title: BONUS EPISODE: Bill Bellamy Talks 2Pac and Biggie + "Top Billin'"
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Comedian & actor Bill Bellamy hangs out with Ebro in the Morning to have a great conversation about hip hop through the years, his start as an MTV DJ, his standup routine, and some of the most proud movies he has been a part of. He also spoke on the Chris Rock and Will Smith incident at the Oscars and shared some rare stories from 2Pac & Notorious B.I.G. You can hear more stories on his podcast 'Top Billin' as well as an upcoming book tentatively titled with the same name! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

description:

He also spoke on the Chris Rock and Will Smith incident at the Oscars and shared some rare stories from 2Pac & Notorious B.I.G.
